message.content:
Sure! Here's a sample healthy meal plan for you for seven days, taking into account your restrictions:

Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with berries and almond milk
Snack: Apple slices with peanut butter
Lunch: Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens, tomatoes, cucumbers, and balsamic vinaigrette dressing
Dinner: Baked fish with roasted vegetables (such as zucchini, bell peppers, and onions)
Day 2:
Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with spinach and tomatoes
Snack: Carrot sticks with hummus
Lunch: Turkey sandwich on whole grain bread with lettuce, tomato, and mayonnaise
Dinner: Stir-fry with tofu, broccoli, carrots, and brown rice
Day 3:
Breakfast: Greek yogurt with berries and granola
Snack: Celery sticks with peanut butter
Lunch: Quinoa salad with black beans, corn, avocado, and lime vinaigrette dressing
Dinner: Grilled shrimp skewers with bell peppers and onions
Day 4:
Breakfast: Smoothie made with bananas, spinach, almond milk, and protein powder
Snack: Hard-boiled eggs
Lunch: Turkey wrap with lettuce, tomato, and mayonnaise
Dinner: Chicken stir-fry with broccoli, carrots, and brown rice
Day 5:
Breakfast: Overnight oats with berries and chia seeds
Snack: Apple slices with peanut butter
Lunch: Tuna salad on whole grain bread with lettuce and tomato
Dinner: Grilled pork chops with roasted sweet potatoes and steamed broccoli
Day 6:
Breakfast: Omelet with spinach, tomatoes, and cheese (use a non-dairy cheese alternative)
Snack: Carrot sticks with hummus
Lunch: Turkey sandwich on whole grain bread with lettuce, tomato, and mayonnaise
Dinner: Stir-fry with tofu, bell peppers, carrots, and brown rice
Day 7:
Breakfast: Greek yogurt with berries and granola
Snack: Celery sticks with peanut butter
Lunch: Quinoa salad with black beans, corn, avocado, and lime vinaigrette dressing
Dinner: Grilled shrimp skewers with bell peppers and onions
Remember to adjust the portions and ingredients according to your personal preferences and dietary needs. Enjoy your healthy meal plan!
